original_text: The Lord Almighty did that! He decided to show that the pride of those people is useless. He decided to bring all those famous people down low.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 그것을 정하신 것이라 모든 누리던 영화를 욕되게 하시며 세상의 모든 교만하던 자가 멸시를 받게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: that the pride of those people is useless.
all those famous people down low.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 모든 유명한 사람들을 낮추는 것을
